text: Bhanidinush ki juna manisa margavicalanama cha, rahamana tyasala'i bistarai lamo chuta di'irakheko huncha, jabasam'ma ki tiniharule ti kuraharu dekhdainan, jasako vacana di'incha arthata sajaya va pralaya (kiyamata). Tyatikhera uniharula'i ramrari thaha hunecha ki ko nimna sreniko cha ra kuna cahim kamajora samuhako cha
